short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ensure your online safety by automatically blocking known malware websites. Updated daily with new definitions!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically prevents Malware from known malicious websites. Prevents loading of known blacklisted sites, browse the net-safer! Takes action on websites deemed malicious or in otherwise in need or a re-direct.

In short: SafetyRedirector is an important part to your computer's overall security. Anti-virus programs work only AFTER you've been infected. SafetyRedirector PREVENTS the initial infection from happening!

Also protects against Phising/Phoney websites.


Important Disclaimer:
Safety Redirector is distributed for free and is supported via selected affiliate links.
